titlestmt.titleproper: John and Susan Edwards Harvith Interview Collection
titlestmt.subtitle: An inventory of their Collection at Syracuse University
titlestmt.author: MRC

list.item: 6 Mar 2017 - Collection name, scope and contents, notes changed and videotapes added (PJM)

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.unittitle: John and Susan Edwards Harvith Interview Collection
did.abstract: Audio and video recordings of interviews by the Harviths of important figures in the history of the arts and the history of radio and television, including actors, conductors, directors, musicians, writers, producers, and others.

bioghist.head: Biographical History
bioghist.p: John Harvith and Susan Edwards Harvith are mass communications and arts historians who together have produced exhibitions and film series, as well as books and articles. Their research has emphasized the interface between the arts and technology in film, photography, radio, and television, resulting in numerous interviews with cinematographers, film editors, musicians, and radio and television pioneers.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents of the Collection
scopecontent.p: The John and Susan Edwards Harvith Interview Collection consists of interviews with over sixty important figures -- actors, comedians, musicians, writers, directors and producers -- in the history of radio and television broadcasting, particular comedy and drama. These interviews, conducted primarily in the subject's homes, offer unique personal insights into the heyday of broadcast television, what it was like to be involved in massively popular television shows of the time, and how American popular culture shaped and was shaped by them. Television shows represented include Father Knows Best, All in the Family, M*A*S*H*, I Love Lucy, and many more.

altformavail.head: Other Formats Available
altformavail.p: All audiocassettes save the interview of Dr. and Mrs. Rose Setnor (harvith_int_131) have been digitized as of March 27, 2017.

arrangement.head: Arrangement of the Collection
arrangement.p: Alphabetical by last name of person being interviewed.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: &scrc_name; has numerous collections relating to music, entertainment, and television and radio broadcasting history. Please &searchcoll; for a complete listing.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: The majority of our archival and manuscript collections are housed off site and require advanced notice for retrieval. Researchers are encouraged to contact us in advance concerning the collection material they wish to access for their research.
Access to videotape and undigitized recordings requires advance notice for production of a listening copy.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Written permission must be obtained from SCRC and all relevant rights holders before publishing quotations, excerpts or images from any materials in this collection.
Listening copies are for on-site use only. Any person wishing to purchase a research copy will need to obtain permission from the copyright holder prior to placing their order.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Preferred citation for this material is as follows:

John and Susan Edwards Harvith Interview Collection,
&su_name;

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p:
Gift of
John Harvith and
Susan Edwards Harvith.
